title: Bitcoin Faces Mounting Pressure Below Key Cost Bases
summary: Realized price levels reveal investor sentiment and upcoming psychological barriers in the crypto market. Understanding these levels can help traders make infor

body.raw:
![Bitcoin Faces Mounting Pressure Below Key Cost Bases](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/s3y3vcno/production/e63508d67a4a5d3ef15aad3cd62f852736ce5443-3200x1800.png?auto=format&w=1920&h=1080&crop=focalpoint&fit=clip)

Realized price levels reveal investor sentiment and upcoming psychological barriers in the crypto market. Understanding these levels can help traders make informed decisions.

---

**Original Article:** [CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data](https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/08/29/bitcoin-faces-mounting-pressure-below-key-cost-bases)
